page.title: 13RELIGION IN PETERHEAD
page.content: You could say that Peterhead is a fairly religious town with many different denominations represented.A few of the different denominations include The Church of Scotland,Baptist Congregational and Methodist.In the last few years more modern type churches have emerged in Peterhead. 45% said they prefer a modern church , 25% said they prefer a more restrained church. 20% said they didn't know and 10% said they don't prefer either. We asked people in the Town Centre if they were a member of a church and 30% said that they were and 70% said that they were not a member,following that we asked if they attended a church regularly and 15% said yes and 85% said no.During the past decade Peterhead has modernised quickly and there seems to be more churches but less people willing to go to them.
